title: Prohibits the operation of a motor vehicle on a public road, street or highway which is equipped with a display device within the view of the operator
summary: Prohibits the operation of a motor vehicle on a public road, street or highway which is equipped with a display device within the view of the operator; and defines the term display device as equipment designed and used for the purpose of receiving and displaying a broadcast image.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the operation of motor vehicles with a display device
